text:
I verified bugs 
60210 and 60229 
that they added sentBytes to JTL output.  But the Aggregate Report (and others) have only KB/s (which is assumed to be received KB/s) and NOT Sent (KB/s).

This will be a very useful metrics.

thanks

Ahmad
creator: anafoosi@hotmail.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
